images.alt_text: AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, showcasing a stunning beach scene with warm waters and palm trees.
AI-selected These destination images will highlight unique experiences in Thailand, including Thai cuisine and local markets, enhancing the exotic and relaxing tone of the campaign.
AI-selected These destination images will highlight unique experiences in Thailand, including Thai cuisine and local markets, enhancing the exotic and relaxing tone of the campaign.
AI-selected These icons will enhance the booking experience, guiding users through the booking process with a friendly and inviting design.
AI-selected These icons will enhance the booking experience, guiding users through the booking process with a friendly and inviting design.
AI-selected The logo will be placed in the header to reinforce brand identity and trustworthiness in the promotional email.
AI-selected This decorative illustration will add a vibrant and tropical feel to the email background, enhancing the overall visual appeal.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn
assetRequirements.content_context: A stunning beach scene in Thailand showcasing warm waters and lush landscapes, evoking a sense of adventure and relaxation.

assetRequirements.purpose: visual representation of Thailand's culture and cuisine
assetRequirements.content_context: Images of Thai food and local markets to highlight the exotic cuisine and cultural experiences available.

assetRequirements.purpose: to emphasize the autumn aspect of the campaign
assetRequirements.content_context: Visuals depicting the pleasant weather and fewer tourists in Thailand during autumn.

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Тайланд ждет вас!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, showcasing a stunning beach scene with warm waters and palm trees.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
